summary: This code is piping the output of `pyiqa_test.py` into `test_pyiqa.sh`, filtering for lines containing "taking time", and returning those results.

details.comment: This code is piping the output of `pyiqa_test.py` into `test_pyiqa.sh`, filtering for lines containing "taking time", and returning those results.
details.content: python3 pyiqa_test.py | xargs -iabc bash test_pyiqa.sh abc 2>&1 | grep "taking time"
